headline: Salesforce Expands Into Defense And Wildfire AI With Long Term Deals
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to support digital modernization and AI enablement. The company also launched EMBERPOINT LLC, a wildfire response venture with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo. Both developments expand Salesforce's role in government technology and public safety infrastructure beyond its core CRM offering. For investors watching Salesforce, these moves show the company leaning further into large scale, mission critical...
